text: ye munaapheqeen khuda kee qasamen khaate hai ki (koee buree baat) nahin kahee haaloki un logon ne kufr ka kalama zaroor kaha aur apane islaam ke baad kaaphir ho gae aur jis baat par qaaboo na pa sake use thaan baithe aur un logen ne (musalamaanon se) sirph is vajah se adaavat kee ki apane phazal va karam se khuda aur usake rasool ne daulat mand bana diya hai to unake lie usamen khair hai ki ye log ab bhee tauba kar len aur agar ye na maanegen to khuda un par duniya aur aakhirat mein dardanaak azaab naazil pharamaega aur tamaam duniya mein un ka na koee haamee hoga aur na madadagaar
